channel.title: 美联社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪美联社news的种子

item.title: 哈莉-贝利（Halle Bailey）说 "我感觉自己像个女人"，她回顾了母亲身份如何为她的歌曲创作打开了 "新的大门"。
item.description:
Halle Bailey says "I feel like a woman" as she reflects on how motherhood has opened a "new portal" for her songwriting. pic.twitter.com/pUu9el5lL4

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) February 25, 2024

item.title: 佩德罗-帕斯卡尔（Pedro Pascal）和科尔曼-多明戈（Colman Domingo）在《名利场》好莱坞版封面大片发布几天后，在美国演员工会奖（SAG Awards）的银色地毯上再次聚首。
item.description:
Pedro Pascal and Colman Domingo reunited on the SAG Awards silver carpet days after the release of their Vanity Fair Hollywood issue cover shoot. pic.twitter.com/blAoKUzNSl

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) February 25, 2024

item.title: 南卡罗来纳州初选的启示：唐纳德-特朗普的共和党主场优势无处不在
item.description:

item.title: 在 SAG 颁奖典礼上，SAG-AFTRA 主席 Fran Drescher 表示，在去年的演员罢工之后，"一切都会好起来的"。
item.description:
At the SAG Awards, SAG-AFTRA President Fran Drescher says "all's well that ends well" after last year's actors strike. pic.twitter.com/DTbCKIGkqo

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) February 25, 2024

item.title: 马克-杜普拉斯（Mark Duplass）说，去年震惊业界的罢工事件发生后，好莱坞许多人都感到 "日子不好过"。
item.description:
Mark Duplass says it’s “not an easy time” for many in Hollywood after last year’s industry-shaking strikes. pic.twitter.com/CZvaankJEk

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) February 25, 2024
